bio:
Kerah, a Redguard woman, is a jewelry merchant who lives with her family in Markarth. She is the wife of Endon, with whom she has a young daughter Adara. Endon and Kerah also have a young adult son named Cade, who is currently fighting as a Stormcloak in the Skyrim civil war.
Recently, a Nord woman named Margret was shopping at Kerah's stall when a Breton man suddenly attacked Margret with a knife.
If the player indicates that they're planning on heading up to Understone Keep, Kerah will ask the player to deliver a custom ring she has made for Calcelmo, an old Altmer man who works as an archaeologist in Understone Keep. Understone Keep is an ancient Dwarven keep built into the mountainside, used as a palace by the Jarl of Markarth.
name: Kerah
